Header: Charges to be filed against MP Mahindananda
Content: The Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption was ordered to file charges against former Sports Minister Mahindananda Aluthgamage and former Chairman of Sathosa Nalin Fernando. Colombo Fort Magistrate Lal Ranasinghe Bandara issued the order today (Mar. 02). They are accused of procuring carom boards worth over Rs. 50 million for the Department of Sports through Sathosa. The incident had occurred during the time of the previous government. The Magistrate also ordered the former Chairman of Sathosa, Nalin Fernando to appear before the Bribery Commission and give a statement to them.
